🇷🇺 #IEK #bonds 
March 12 - collection of applications for a new bond IEK Group of the 001P -03 series. 

The duration of the bonds will be 1.5 years, the amount of accommodation is at least 1 billion rubles.

Bonds will be available for purchase by unskilled investors (the minimum application is 1,000 rubles) subject to the passage of test No. 6. For the release, fixed monthly coupon payments will be provided. The guide of the coupon is not higher than 25% per annum (profitability is not higher than 28.07% per annum for reinvestment).

This is the third issue of bonds for the issuer: the company held a debut release in 2022 for a period of 3 years, the second - in 2023 (was repaid in December 2024). The company notes that the bonds were in demand among investors, the share of retail in previous bond issues was noted at about 30%.

Trump officially signed a decree on the creation of a strategic crypto-reserve of the United States

• The strategic reserve will be created using confiscated BTC, as well as through purchases.

• BTC will not be sold.

• The Ministry of Finance and the Ministry of Education will develop a strategy neutral for the budget for the purchase of additional BTC.

• A reserve will be created for other confiscated digital assets.

• The government will not purchase additional assets for the reserve of other digital assets outside the confiscated.

• The United States is positioned as a leader in the government strategy of digital assets.

According to the results of 2024, the consolidated revenue of the MTS group increased by 16.1% g/g to 703.7 billion rubles. Revenue grew against the background of increasing income of all business areas.

The Group OIBDA growth in the reporting period amounted to 5.2% to 246 billion rubles. Sustainable OIBDA dynamics is supported by communications and advertising segment services. The deterrent on OIBDA growth was exerted on the development of promising areas, ecosystems and personnel.

The ecosystem base increased by 16% per year - to 17.5 million customers. The main drivers of attracting new customers are Kion, MTS Yrent, defender and subscription of MTS Premium.

At the end of the year, net profit amounted to 49 billion rubles: the pressure on the size of net profit was external, including a high refinancing rate.

"MTS has approached the new stage of the MTS transformation in the entire history of the company-over 700 billion rubles. MTS continues to demonstrate a high double-digit revenue growth due to an increase in the revenue from the basic telecom services, as well as thanks to the fast-growing areas of AdTech and Fintech." - Inessa Galaktionova, General Director and Chairman of the Board of PJSC MTS

Rosfinmonitoring planned to begin a full connection of Russian banks to the Transparent blockchain service until the end of 2025

Rosfinmonitoring intends until the end of 2025 to begin the full connection of Russian banks to the transparent blockchain service, which allows you to identify the connection of the client’s operations with conventional (fiat) money and cryptocurrency. This was told by RBC by the Deputy Director of the Federal Service for Financial Monitoring Anton Lisitsyn

The transparent blockchain service, which allows you to analyze cryptotracles, started in Russia in 2021 Rosfinmonitoring developed it together with law enforcement agencies and the Academy of Sciences. Lisitsyn said that over 12,000 users are currently connected to the service - law enforcement officers and foreign -missile intelligence units, for example, in the CIS countries. Banks began testing technology in 2023.

Business offers to allow the use of cryptocurrencies to professional participants and Kwalah

Professional participants in the securities market and qualified investors can be allowed to use cryptocurrencies - the draft resolution of participants in the financial forum, which took place on February 18 in the Russian Union of Industrialists and Entrepreneurs (RSPP), says.

The forum participants offer the authorities to fully introduce stablebcoins (cryptocurrencies, the cost of which is tied to a specific asset) in foreign economic calculations and as soon as possible to complete the formation of key elements of the effective work of the Central Department of Internal Affairs, follows from the project of the resolution.

Press Conf the Russian side - says Lavrov: 

- The conversation was very useful 

- The Russian Federation and the United States will ensure the speedy appointment of ambassadors

- Russia and the United States agreed that everything needs to be done to join efforts in geopolitical spheres and economic affairs

- agreed to eliminate barriers in relations

- There is reason to believe that the American side began to better hear the position of Russia

- Russia and the USA agreed that when their interests do not coincide, they need not to provoke a conflict, but to solve problems

- Russia and the United States agreed that in the near future the process of Ukrainian settlement will be formed, negotiators were appointed

- During the negotiations, an agreement was reached with the United States to create conditions as the Ukrainian conflict is resolved so that the cooperation between Russia and the States would resume in full

- Russia and the United States agreed that it is necessary to remove obstacles for mutually beneficial economic cooperation

- The Russian Federation and the United States practically agreed "once and for all" to solve issues with the functioning of the diplomatic mission of the two countries

- representatives of the Russian Federation and the United States are instructed to discuss what needs to be done to prepare the meeting of Putin and Trump

- Consultations of Russia and the United States in Ukraine will be regular after both parties appoint negotiation teams

- I have not seen any “three -stage plan” of the USA to resolve in Ukraine, the United States said that a message about a plan of three points in Ukraine is a fake

- The emergence of troops from the same NATO countries, but under a stranger flag, the flag of the European Union or national is unacceptable. - The United States proposed to introduce a moratorium on attacks on the energy facilities of the Russian Federation and Ukraine

- The attack of Ukrainian drones on the KTK pumping station should only strengthen everyone in the opinion that Zelensky must be given by hand

- Today we have established relations with the United States and is not successful

- The United States and Russia agreed to solve problems with banking transfers

Russian miners are worried about the preservation of some hypersensitive data that are collected by the state in the framework of the new regulation (for example, the number of cryptocurns). This question is to me, as one of the author of the mining law, at different sites. Obviously, the leakage of information about wallets can be a big gift to our geopolitical opponents, so I decided to discuss with the Federal Tax Service how well this data is protected.

In the Federal Tax Service, I was assured that information about the steady cryptocurrencies and addresses-identifiers is stored in a separate internal protected system, and access to it is seriously limited even inside the department, and it is almost impossible to get it from the outside. And although cybersecurity experts love to repeat the mantra “everything that can deliver, sooner or later leaks”, the Federal Tax Service claims that the risk of leakage of sensitive information from its internal systems is now reduced to zero.

- Gorelkin

🛢🇪🇺🇷🇺 #LNG #Russia #sanctions 
The EU is unlikely to offer a rejection of Russian LNG as part of the 16th package of sanctions against Moscow. Due to the high dependence on supplies from Russia. Russian LNG remains one of the last large sources of energy dependence of Europe after the transit of gas through Ukraine was discontinued. In addition, sanctions on the part of the EU require unanimity, which will be difficult to achieve against the backdrop of active opposition of Hungary and the preserved dependence of some other countries from gas from the Russian Federation. Last year, the EU imported record volumes of LNG from Russia, the largest importers were France, Spain and Belgium.

Instead of a sharp refusal of LNG from the Russian Federation, the EU will rely on a roadmap, aimed at a phased reduction in the import of Russian fossil fuel. 

European politicians refrain from a sharp tightening of fuel restrictions in order to avoid price shocks that have caused damage to the industries of the region’s industry in recent years. But from 2026 - 2027, it is expected that new deliveries from the factories under construction in the USA and Qatar will help reduce the prices of LNG. 

- Sources of BBG

🇷🇺 #fx #Russia #RUB 
There are several reasons to strengthen the ruble - experts 

1) the first decrees of Trump have not yet affect Russia
2) a decrease in geopolitical risk premium against the backdrop of the upcoming negotiations in Ukraine 
3) the decision of the Central Bank to increase the supply of currency in the market according to the budget rule - from January 15 to February 6
4) the tax period when exporters sell currency to pay fees in rubles
5) the growth of oil, gas and gold quotations
6) still high interest rates on rubles
7) restrictions on the outflow of currency from Russia
8) high calculations in rubles for imports
9) a positive trade balance of the Russian Federation
10) seasonality - at the beginning of the year, traditionally weak demand for foreign currency from importers
——————————————————
#Poll #Forecast Course on the horizon of the month will return to the range of 100-105 rubles. Against the backdrop of a stable price of oil and cooling the import of goods into Russia. The price of the dollar near 100 rubles. Comfortable for the budget, exporters and buyers of currency, and a new wave of weakening of the ruble is possible closer to spring. - Experts, Vedomosti

🇷🇺 #IPO #Russia #macro 
The Bank of Russia has submitted a plan to increase the transparency of the IPO market. Among its points is the expansion of the circle of information available to the investor and strengthening the role of the organizers. 

In the past two years, the Russian shareholder market has been restored at the expense of domestic resources - by the forces of not only institutional investors, but also retail, whose activity grew multiplying from year to year. But the interests of individuals were not fully taken into account: information asymmetry was outlined on the market, which impedes an increase in trust in the IPO Institute, the Bank of Russia writes in a new report for public consultations. 

The Bank of Russia proposes to increase the transparency of public placements - to change the content of information disclosed by issuers and adapt it to the needs of the retail investor, to improve the quality of the IPO.

⚠️🇺🇸 #ceiling #debt #default #USA #markets #WARNing 
In the United States, a public debt ceiling will be reached very soon. 

If the Congress by this time does not have time to agree on an increase in the ceiling, then the markets will traditionally smell. The ceiling, ultimately, of course will be increased (this always happens), but they can do it in a timely manner due to disagreements in the Congress-experts

In 2011, SP500 fell by 17% by untimely increase in the US State debt ceiling due to disagreements in Congress (schedule)

The formal ceiling was reached on January 2, but the Ministry of Finance received a delay due to the planned repayment of the debt by $ 54 billion, so the achievement of the "real" ceiling shifted for several weeks.

Yellen said that the US Treasury will begin to take measures to prevent default on January 21. The department will suspend the allocation of funds for the payment of some benefits. She called for operational actions to protect confidence in the United States. Extraordinary measures may be the accounting maneuvers of the Ministry of Finance - ways to redistribute money between government accounts, so as not to go beyond the borrowing limit and win the time for the congress that will raise the ceiling of the public debt.

Coal drove into a dead end. He was delivered there by railways, sanctions and poor export conditions - Vedomosti 

The Russian coal industry in 2024 for the first time in many years ran into a large -scale crisis. Separately, the reasons for this crisis do not cause a critical threat to the business of coal companies, but in conjunction - they put the industry in an extremely difficult position, which is not yet visible. 

There were no special prerequisites for the crisis. The demand for coal in the world in 2024 continued to grow, according to the forecast of the International Energy Agency, he will again update the historical maximum, having reached 7.25 billion tons. Consumption in countries that are the largest importers of Russian raw materials - China and India. The prices of coal in the world market, although decreased, but still significantly higher than the levels of 2017–2021.

✴️🇷🇺 #Crypto #Taxes #Russia #Regulation 
The new rules for taxation of cryptocurrencies entered into force on January 1. 

According to new norms, cryptocurrency is still recognized as property. Operations with her will not be subject to VAT.

Individuals must pay personal income tax from income received from such operations. At the same time, they are taken into account in the same tax base with income from operations with securities - that is, if the total income from sales of all these assets is less than 2.4 million rubles a year, the personal income tax rate for them will be 13%, and the income will be above at a rate of 15%. Higher progressive personal income tax rates for these income are not provided.
——————————–
Cryptocurrency miners must pay tax when it was extracted. In this case, the cost of the currency will be determined by quotes on one of the foreign exchanges at the choice of a taxpayer.

Risks for the economy from raising the key rate at the current stage are more serious than when maintaining it

The participants in the discussion noted that the monetary conditions (DKU) were tightened more than expected in October. While maintaining the stiffness of the DKU, there is reason to expect a faster slowing down the growth of lending and aggregate demand in 2025, which suggested the October forecast of the Bank of Russia. This will slow down prices and reduce inflation expectations even taking into account the increase in inflationary pressure in recent months. - Central Bank

The participants noted that if by the February meeting of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Russia, the accelerated lending growth will resume, and the trends in the dynamics of inflation will not unfold, it may have to be raised again to raise the issue of raising the key rate.

Annual inflation in early 2025 will continue to grow and probably reach a peak in April.

Regular operations on the budget rule compensate for the excess or lack of foreign exchange earnings from the fluctuations of the oil market, and the adjustment of the net sales gives the ruble relatively small support. 🇬🇧 #Britain #TTP #macro
Britain became a member of the Transstoocaian Partnership (TTP)

Entry into the TTP will expand Britain's access to the Asian markets. Britain counts on duty -free access to its goods, including alcoholic beverages and cars, to TTP countries. Joining TTP is a key part of the British government plan to strengthen the country's position in the field of international trade after Brexit

The comprehensive and progressive agreement on TTP previously included Australia, Brunei, Vietnam, Canada, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Peru, Singapore, Chile and Japan. Now 15% of the planet’s GDP is in the countries of this partnership, in which about 580 million people live.

Lavrov in an interview with Carlson: 

Russia and the United States are not officially fighting, but a hybrid war is being waged against Moscow. Western Europe wants to approach the borders of the Russian Federation through Ukraine.

 The “hazel” blow showed that the Russian Federation is ready to use any means, so as not to allow the West to achieve its “strategic defeat”. Russia is ready to send additional “messages” if the West does not draw the necessary conclusions after applying “hazel”.

In the West they make a serious mistake, believing that the Red Lines can shift. Moscow is ready for any development of events around Ukraine.

Conversations of US politicians about the possibility of limited nuclear strikes are an invitation to disaster.

The position of the Russian Federation is legal: no NATO "on the doorstep". There should be no NATO, military bases and exercises with the participation of foreign troops in Ukraine. The West will have to take into account the realities on Earth for an agreement on Ukraine. The Ukrainian conflict should be resolved on the basis of the UN Charter, but in its entirety.

Russia will judge the Trump administration by specific steps, but Biden wants to leave him a difficult legacy.

Aggression against the Russian Federation of any country from a military bloc will be considered as aggression of the entire block

Investments in oil production in Russia by 2050 will increase almost double. But this may require adjustment of the taxation regime of the industry - statements 

Investments in oil production in Russia will increase by 2050 by 1.8 times relative to the level of 2023 and reached 4.5 trillion rubles. According to the Ministry of Energy, the main growth of captures will be in the period of 2024–2025. The deterioration of the mineral resource base in Russia requires the involvement of unprofitable reserves and an increase in the volume of exploration.

In the target scenario, oil production in Russia should grow from 531 million tons in 2023 to 540 million tons in 2030, after which it will remain at this level until 2050.

Reducing the tax burden is necessary even to maintain the current level of investment

✴️🇷🇺 #mining #Taxes #Crypto #Regulation #Russia 
The Cabinet of Ministers approved the amendments to the mining bill governing the taxation of cryptocurrencies - the Ministry of Finance of the Russian Federation - TASS

It is clarified that the digital currency will be recognized for tax purposes by property. "Income in the form of a digital currency obtained as a result of mining will be taken into account as it is received in the amount of its market value. In this case, income can be reduced by expenses incurred due to mining"

So, operations with digital currency will not be taxed. Revenues from operations with digital currency will be taken into account in one tax base with income from operations with securities. Thus, the limiting rate of personal income tax during the taxation of cryptocurrency will not exceed 15%.

The mining infrastructure operator will need to report to the tax authorities information about persons who mining using its infrastructure.
